alert.note: Alert for Crittenden; Lee (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flash Flood Watch issued May 09 at 1:13PM CDT until May 10 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WATCH FOR THE POTENTIAL FAILURE OF ARKABUTLA DAM ON THE COLDWATER RIVER IN EFFECT THROUGH WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flash Flooding caused by a potential dam or levee failure is possible at the Arkabutla Dam on the Coldwater River. * WHERE...Portions of East Arkansas and North Mississippi, including the following areas, in East Arkansas, Crittenden and Lee AR. In North Mississippi, Coahoma, DeSoto, Panola, Quitman, Tallahatchie, Tate and Tunica. * WHEN...Through Wednesday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Dam failure may result in flash flooding of low-lying areas below the dam. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Structural damage relayed by U.S. Army Corps of Engineers - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
